verbose_text: We also asked whether a daf-2 mutation could rescue the progressive sterility of late generation prg-1 mutants by propagating sibling strains that were heterozygous for a recessive daf-2 mutation but homozygous mutant for prg-1 until late generations (F18) and then isolated prg-1 -/-; daf-2 -/- homozygotes.
evidence: daf-2 mutation could rescue the progressive sterility of late-generation prg-1
